author: Kieran Connor
comment: Excited to use this app and potentially the wearable once it's realised by I can't sign up using a @hotmail.co.uk email address. Please fix so I can use the app

reply.author: Actofit Developers
reply.content: Hi Kieran, the verification mail sent after sign up might be in your spam folder, unlike other mailing services like Gmail, Yahoo, Rediff, etc. where it appears in the inbox directly. Please check your spam folder next time you attempt a sign-up. Hope this solves your issue. If it still doesn't please email us at support@actofit.com
